official_title: A bill to repeal the requirements that only United States-built and documented vessels may be used in the trade between points in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act of 1920 to repeal requirements that only United States built and documented vessels may be used in the transportation of merchandise and passengers between points in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirements that only United States-built and documented vessels may be used in the trade between points in the United States.
